mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT JOIN LOCATION USING(LOCATION_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, LIKE_FL, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_DEL_FL, RESTAURANT_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM "REVIEW" WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} ) T JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NAME FROM "MEMBER") USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE T.RN = #{reviewRownum}
